Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://mail.yahoo.com/b/folders/1?_src=ym&reason=myc&folderType=INBOX](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmail.yahoo.com%2Fb%2Ffolders%2F1%3F_src%3Dym%26reason%3Dmyc%26folderType%3DINBOX) ### Comment > I've been using AdGuard to block ads on YahooMail, sometimes having to do it manually until they go away at the top of the list. However, in the past few days, it seems to have stopped blocking the ads, and when I click "Block Ads Manually", it does absolutely nothing. Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/214783#issuecomment-3373715508
It has been fixed yesterday, but unfortunately, MV3 extension cannot update filters due to Google policy, so new rules will be available in one of the next extension updates.
Until then, please add following rules to user rules:
```adblock
||mangadex.org/promo/
||e-embed.mangadex.org/stable/embed/external/ads.html
mangadex.org##iframe[src*="/embed/external/ads.html"]
mangadex.org##.md-content .justify-center > a[target="_blank"] > img
```

comment.body:
Not reproduced on my end.
Try to update the filters (wait almost one minute there), clear browser data, restart it, open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).
